summary: Iteration 8 testing completed - all 10 requested features verified working: JWT Authentication (Register/Login/Logout), Total Cost column in grid, Excel export with Total Cost, Skills page Excel upload buttons, Proficiency Rates page Excel upload buttons, Project templates (Template badge, Save as Template dialog, Create from Template dropdown).
passed_tests: JWT Authentication - Register new user (POST /auth/register returns token and user)
JWT Authentication - Login with existing user (POST /auth/login with test@example.com/test123)
JWT Authentication - Logout functionality (Sign Out button visible, clears token, redirects to login)
JWT Authentication - /auth/me endpoint returns current user with valid token
JWT Authentication - Invalid credentials rejected with 401
Total Cost column shows in estimator grid (Salary Cost + Overhead)
Excel export includes Total Cost column (verified in code: line 961)
Skills page has Template download button (data-testid=download-template-button)
Skills page has Upload Excel button (data-testid=upload-excel-button)
Proficiency Rates page has Template download button
Proficiency Rates page has Upload Excel button
Projects page shows Template badge for template projects (PRJ-0011 has green Template badge)
Save as Template dialog works (opens with template name input and Save Template button)
Create from Template dropdown works (opens with template select and Create Project button)
Projects created from template show '(from template)' in name (PRJ-0012, PRJ-0013)
critical_code_review_comments: All 10 requested features are implemented correctly
JWT tokens use HS256 algorithm with 24-hour expiration
Password hashing uses SHA256 (consider bcrypt for production)
Template functionality properly marks projects with is_template=True and template_name
Excel upload/download on Skills/Proficiency Rates uses xlsx library correctly
Total Cost = Salary Cost + Overhead calculated correctly in grid and exports
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing test@example.com user and PRJ-0011 template project.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 8 features verified working. Key features: 1) JWT Auth with Login/Register tabs, /auth/login, /auth/register, /auth/me endpoints; 2) Logout via 'Sign Out' button clears localStorage token; 3) Total Cost column visible in estimator grid (right of Overhead column); 4) Skills and Proficiency Rates pages have Template download and Upload Excel buttons; 5) Projects page shows Template badge on template projects, has From Template button, Save as Template bookmark icons; 6) PRJ-0011 is marked as template, PRJ-0012 and PRJ-0013 were created from template.

jwt_register.evidence: Register form with name/email/password fields, POST /auth/register returns token and user object

jwt_login.evidence: Login with test@example.com/test123 returns token, redirects to /dashboard

jwt_logout.evidence: Sign Out button visible in sidebar, clicking redirects to login page

total_cost_column.evidence: Grid shows columns: Total MM, Salary Cost, Overhead, Total Cost, Selling Price

excel_export_total_cost.evidence: Code line 961 shows header with 'Total Cost' column

rates_template_button.evidence: data-testid=download-template-button found on Proficiency Rates page

rates_upload_button.evidence: data-testid=upload-excel-button found on Proficiency Rates page

save_as_template_dialog.evidence: Dialog opens with template name input and 'Save Template' button

create_from_template_dialog.evidence: Dialog opens with template dropdown and 'Create Project' button

api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/auth/register: Creates new user, returns JWT token - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/auth/login: Authenticates user, returns JWT token - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/auth/me: Returns current user with valid token - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/templates: Returns list of template projects - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/projects/create-from-template/: Creates new project from template - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/skills: Returns skills for Excel upload mapping - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/proficiency-rates: Returns rates for Excel upload mapping - PASS
